Weapons:

SPIKE LAUNCHER
+4 ATTACKRange 5   Threat 3   5 Kinetic   LOADED
At T2, this weapon can make two attacks at a time, targeting either the same character or two different ones. At T3, it can make three attacks at a time.

Templates:

EXOTIC


Systems:

GOLIATH

SPIKE LAUNCHER

At T2, this weapon can make two attacks at a time, targeting either the same character or two different ones. At T3, it can make three attacks at a time.

AGGRESSION

A character within line of sight and Sensors gains +3 difficulty to attack against any character other than the Goliath until the start of the Goliath’s next turn.

HEAVY TRUNK

The Goliath can’t be pushed, pulled, knocked Prone, or knocked back by smaller characters.

GUARDIAN

Allied characters can use the Goliath for hard cover.

PADDED

The Goliath has Resistance to all damage from attacks that originate beyond range 3.

POWER KNUCKLE

A character within range 2 must pass a Hull save or take {4/5/6} Kinetic damage, be pushed 5 spaces directly away from the Goliath, and knocked Prone.

CRUSHING EMBRACE

A character adjacent to the Goliath must succeed on an Agility save or automatically be grappled by the Goliath and become Jammed until they are no longer grappled. The Goliath can only grapple one character this way at a time.

PIN

A character within range 2 becomes Immobilized and Impaired until they either damage the Goliath, the Goliath is Stunned or destroyed, or the Goliath targets another character with this effect. The Goliath is Immobilized for the duration of this effect.

EXOTIC

HARDENED TARGET

The Exotic gains +1 Accuracy on Systems saves, and tech attacks against them receive +1 Difficulty.

CACTECH

Scan doesn’t reveal any information about Exotic Systems.

EXOTIC SYSTEMS

The Exotic chooses up to two options from the Exotic Systems and Traits list.

UNKNOWN EXOTIC SYSTEM
